item.description:
Head up to the Innitou Ski Runners this weekend for our Meet and Greet Weekend!

Start the weekend off early with $9 skiing at Wildcat Mountain. You can upgrade your ticket by 3PM for $39 skiing on Saturday.

Your Innitou experience will begin on Friday night with a meet and greet in the Innitou Rec Room. Shoot some pool, listen to some tunes on our computer jukebox. Some beverages and light snacks will be provided.

On Saturday, head back to Wildcat with your upgraded ticket or head on over to Bretton Woods for a day of skiing (lift ticket provided to new guests with weekend package).

Back to the Innitou house on Saturday night for a fun evening meeting new friends!

Limited availability $100 new guest package includes all of the following:
*2 nights lodging (Fri/Sat)
*Bretton Woods lift ticket ($74 value!)
*Friday night meet & greet
*Saturday evening apres ski
(Pre-payment will be required to hold your spot for this package - PayPal is available for a small convenience charge)

Above cost is $55 without Bretton Woods lift ticket.

Other optional activities are additional:
*Downhill Skiing at any number of the local ski resorts
*Cross-country trails - Chocolate tour this weekend!
*Contact us for more information on private events scheduled throughout the weekend
*Discount shopping at the outlets

We hope you can join us!

group.name: Innitou Ski Runners & Rider's Activities Club of New England

item.name: Get to Know the Innitous 2/26 Weekend - Discounted Skiing Opportunities!
